channel.title: [317] Acedscape || All skills || 24/7 || Be the first to join! ||
channel.description:
Website - http://Acedscape.com Forums - http://www.acedscape.com/forums/index.php?/portal/ Play now - http://acedscape.com/webclient.html Client Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36609049/Aced.jar
Hope to see you on!
- No lag, 24-7. - 25/25 Working skills! - Stable economy. - Fully Working dwarf multicannon - Perfectly working Hunter - Perfect combat - Revenants - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Two custom quests. - Full farming - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - Dungeoneering with multiple floors - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks - Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars - Full duel arena - Abyssal whip vine - Bh pk system - Killstreak system - Hiscores ( Currently working on ) - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Perfect korasi sword. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Advanced teleporting system with jewellery. - Vote4Reward (Currently down) - Active Community. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enormous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins
Media!
Home [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2pytan7.png[/img]
Skilling teleport [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/ezn52r.png[/img]
Bosses [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/29xgoed.png[/img]
Minigames [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2wei7ma.png[/img]

item.description:
@Impact-3 wrote:

Website - http://Acedscape.com
Forums - http://www.acedscape.com/forums/index.php?/portal/
Play now - http://acedscape.com/webclient.html
Client Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36609049/Aced.jar

Hope to see you on!

  • No lag, 24-7.
  • 25/25 Working skills!
  • Stable economy.
  • Fully Working dwarf multicannon
  • Perfectly working Hunter
  • Perfect combat
  • Revenants
  • 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • Two custom quests.
  • Full farming
  • Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etcâ€¦)
  • Dungeoneering with multiple floors
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest/old hit marks
  • Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars
  • Full duel arena
  • Abyssal whip vine
  • Bh pk system
  • Killstreak system
  • Hiscores ( Currently working on )
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Perfect korasi sword.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more.
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Advanced teleporting system with jewellery.
  • Vote4Reward (Currently down)
  • Active Community.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enormous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins
